project.name: C-C127B-OSSL-07-ST03-DT03-DF01-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127B-OSSL-07-ST03-DT03-DF01-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Has a heap buffer of size 64. Reads in an ascii string from an environment variable and copies the final 63 characters into the heap buffer. Then reads the variable back from the heap buffer in reverse order, but incorrectly uses the size of the original string. If the original string is longer than 63characters, this will result in an underread.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127B-OSSL-07-ST03-DT03-DF01-CF03-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Has a heap buffer of size 64. Reads in an ascii string from an environment variable and copies the final 63 characters into the heap buffer. Then reads the variable back from the heap buffer in reverse order, but incorrectly uses the size of the original string. If the original string is longer than 63characters, this will result in an underread.
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
